query: SELECT "user".id, "user".username, "user".password, "user".mfa_secret FROM "user" LEFT JOIN user_email ON user_email.user_id = "user".id LEFT JOIN domain ON domain.id = user_email.domain_id LEFT JOIN user_phone_number ON user_phone_number.user_id = "user".id LEFT JOIN phone_number_country_code ON phone_number_country_code.country_code = user_phone_number.country_code WHERE "user".username = $1 OR CONCAT( user_email.local, '@', domain.name, '.', domain.tld ) = $1 OR CONCAT( '+', phone_number_country_code.phone_code, user_phone_number.number ) = $1;
